definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: This is bad news for birds like the Whitethroat, a common farmland bird.
sentences.chinese: 對於田野上常見的白喉雀這種鳥類，這是個壞消息。

sentences.english: No Corynebacterium diphtheriae was isolated from the nasopharyngeal swabs, neither of the patient nor of the close contacts.
sentences.chinese: 患者及其密切接觸者咽拭子均未分離到白喉棒狀桿菌。

sentences.english: Calf diphtheria, is characterized by bilateral necrosis of the mucous membrane of the larynx.
sentences.chinese: 犢白喉，以喉粘膜的兩側性壞死爲特徵。

sentences.english: Diphtheria is. treated with an antitoxin that neutralizes the toxin and produces long-term immunity.
sentences.chinese: 治療方式爲及時注射白喉抗毒素，產生長期的免疫力。

sentences.english: Aconitum ceucostomum is the perennial poisonous plant.
sentences.chinese: 白喉烏頭爲毛茛科多年生有毒植物。

sentences.english: A willow warbler is similar to the greater whitethroat but smaller.
sentences.chinese: 柳鶯與大白喉鶯相似，但體型較小。

sentences.english: It is caused by a bacteria named Corynebacterium diphtheriae.
sentences.chinese: 這是由於細菌命名白喉棒狀桿菌。

sentences.english: Old World warbler similar to the greater whitethroat but smaller.
sentences.chinese: 東半球與大白喉鶯的鳥但體型較小。

definition: epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
